channel.title: dockerfile on IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in dockerfile on IT Quicktasks

item.title: Using a Dockerfile
item.description: # Build an image using the Dockerfile at current location (specified by '.' at the end) # Example: docker build -t [name] . docker build -t my_mongodb . To create a Dockerfile, see https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/docker-explained-using-dockerfiles-to-automate-building-of-images

item.title: Install PHP Module Inside Dockerfile
item.description: Add this to Dockerfile RUN docker-php-ext-install mysqli See details in https://github.com/docker-library/php/issues/279
